name: Bubble Composure
description:
Test and sharpen your power of composure now.

You objective is to drag the bubble to go as far as possible without touch the edge of the path.

Feature:
Three play modes: Easy, Medium and Hard.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game.
Retina display optimised.
Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch.

Don't forget to rate us in the App Store
